name: Icebox (Karmelyth)
description:
Protect the life of your mage by freezing your foes and launching them at the opposition to cause major havoc.

Made for a private game jam in 8 hours.

Controls:

   WASD: Move

   Left mouse button: Fire your ice projectile

    RIght mouse button: Push frozen and unfrozen enemies

Credits:

   Sprites by THX @overgrownrobot

   Code by Karmelyth @karmelyth (Karmelyth#7168)
